Create Library Item

Toolbar / Icon:
   
Menu: Block - Create Library Item
Shortcut: B, T
Commands: librarycreate | bt

Description:

Creates a new part library item from a selection in the drawing.

Procedure:

  1. Select the entities you want to use for the new library item.
  2. Specify the reference point of the item.
  3. Enter a name for the new item and choose a library and location where to store the item. Click OK.
